availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Estill County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Louisa Jane Wete King in Estill County, Kentucky, on April 8, 1845. Father of Franklin King, Silas King, Tempey King, Sarah King, Lyhue King, Amanda C. King, Granville King, and Marion King. Farmer in Estill County in 1850. Farmer in Estill County in 1860. Farmer in Estill County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Estill County, p. 89B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Estill County, p. 129.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Estill County, Forks Precinct, p. 514B.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Estill County, KY, July & December 1863, p. 91.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File #14424.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Estill County Marriages, Film #000254628, p. 149.
